EmailTemplate.subject: Take Advantage of the State of Missouri Government Fleet Program
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Did you know your state has a Fleet Card Program that offers discounted rates on fuel and service that you’re eligible for?
As a government entity, you’re eligible to participate in the Wright Express Government Fleet Card Program that makes fueling easy for your drivers and makes fuel expense management fast and easy for you.
Save Money - Valuable rebates on all monthly purchases - Plus, it’s free to get started – no setup fees or monthly card fees
Save Time Administrative time is reduced and fiscal reporting is made easier with detailed reporting
Easy-to-Use 24/7 customer service, plus full account online self-service
The sooner you act, the sooner you’ll start saving! To learn more about how you can participate in the Wright Express Government Fleet Card Program, visit http://www.wrightexpress.com/missouri.
Sincerely,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Title} Phone: {!User.Phone}
